reviewText: It is amazing what these guys do.  I would like to know how many sleds they destroy as they are getting some of these shots.
very good movie, clean pg-13 big air liked it a lot.  Good to get you charged up to go riding.

I really like these films but I was kind of hoping to see more of the goofy skits that they included back in the first few films. Overall a good video. When will one of these crews give us an option for no music soundtrack, I personally would rather hear the sound of a high revving two stroke engine screaming up the mountain.
